summary: Combat-Ranger-Destruction unique class. Follower inspired on the beautiful actress Megan Fox featuring an unique Class, unique AI and an unique Combat Style reinvented. Perks added according to her Combat Style and Class. Unique tattoo included for UNP/CBBE users. She is now full STANDALONE.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1498672612.jpg[/img]
Current change log

Version 1.4.6
Race Records updated for mounted combat
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--New version for CBBE users by request--
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Combat-Ranger-Destruction unique class. Follower inspired on the beautiful actress Megan Fox featuring an unique Class,
unique AI and an unique Combat Style reinvented. Perks added according to her Combat Style and Class. She is marriageable.
Amazing Full [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19319]WitchElf Armor[/url] Set included (kindly granted by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2311175]Squizzo[/url]). Level cap 100 (going with player). You can find her at Windhelm
in the Palace of Kings (in the morning she goes shopping at the market).
The tatoo you see in the pictures is included on the UNP version of this mod but i dont have any credit for it. The tattoo exists thanks
to the wonderful work of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3650229]m0ckin9bird[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3962945]Agito69[/url]. I just adjusted and combined some details from the work of these nice modders
(plz notify me if i'm forgetting someone).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DestructionMaster
DestructionDualCasting
Impact
AugmentedFlames
IntenseFlames
Overdraw80
CriticalShot90
HuntersDiscipline
Ranger
Bullseye
QuickShot
Armsman80
MuffledMovement
LightFoot, and much more!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Feel free to report issues. Go get her and have fun!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes[/url] by nevenbridge.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13571]Dual Wield for Followers[/url] by fLokii.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17746]DSpSoB - Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back[/url] by DarkPhoenix.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4020]Move it Dammit for NPC Companions and Followers[/url] by Apogee777.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] by fLokii.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2311175]Squizzo[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19319]Witch Elf Armour - UNP[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4129181]newmiller[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28898]Witch Elf Armor - CBBE[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3751738]Den987[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19613]Witch Elf Armor Retexture[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3650229]m0ckin9bird[/url] for her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19726]Khaleesi Dragon Tattoos CBBE and UNP body[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3962945]Agito69[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17093]Simply Army and Tattoos[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiHair[/url] by Apachii.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731]UNP Fitness Body - Also CBBE[/url] by Svarog.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]univision Face[/url] by DD AKT.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] by tktk.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14294]OSARE Underwear - UNP[/url] by anano (Revamped by me for WichElf outfit).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3476923]Gweneal[/url] for her full support, screen shots and Beta testing.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

files.name: Megan STANDALONE UNP 1_4_1
files.changelogHtml:
Class status re-balanced accordingly initial release like intended
Witch elf chest moved to Megan room (2nd floor in the palace of Kings) - it will not interfere with the original chest anymore
All perks and abilities should work fine now
Witch elf chest updated to contain the full set
